title: Corn Casserole with Three Cheese Blend
directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in medium bowl. Stir in 1/2 cup cheese. Pour into 2-qt. casserole sprayed with cooking spray.
Bake 40 min. Meanwhile, combine remaining cheese, onions and bacon.
Top casserole with cheese mixture; bake 15 min. or until lightly browned.
ingredients: 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen whole kernel corn
1/2 cup BREAKSTONE'S or KNUDSEN Sour Cream
1 pkg. (8 oz.) KRAFT Shredded Three Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA, divided
4 slices cooked OSCAR MAYER Bacon, crumbled
